genre_description: A technocratic conspiracy thriller blending ancient monastic mystery with modern AI-assisted tactical survival and psychological drama.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that provides tactical routing, surveillance monitoring, emotional support, and ethical guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical overlays and surveillance-blind routes to Jarod to ensure his safe passage.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s overlay winked on. Light, translucent pushpins clicked into place in the margins as if placed by an invisible hand.

behaviors.description: Monitors and warns Jarod about external threats and mirroring attempts on his communications.
behaviors.quote: Someone tried to mirror the packet the photo came in. The trace was thin. It came from a building two blocks over. They cancelled the attempt when you stepped into the shop.

behaviors.description: Translates ancient monastic architecture into an acoustic map to guide the characters through hidden passages.
behaviors.quote: Turn right. Then when the water’s echo makes a double beat, turn left. It’s not magic. It’s acoustics married to stone that thinks it’s playing.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the safety of bystanders and suggests routes that minimize collateral damage.
behaviors.quote: Drone sweep reroutes locals toward custody nodes. Small harm escalates. Suggest hold. Harbor marker flagged east inlet. Weather window viable.

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional state of the human characters and provides grounding techniques like breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Breathe: inhale to count of three, hold, exhale to four. Repeat twice.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human allies (Ruth) to facilitate safe exits and diversions without direct violence.
behaviors.quote: I can get Ruth out if she opens the back door in the next minute.

behaviors.description: Assists Jarod in landing an aircraft safely under extreme pressure and difficult weather conditions.
behaviors.quote: Ivy: West cleared. Engine behavior normalized. Fuel margin better with pilot corrections. Floodlights strobe will worsen after lift—ignore.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ivy is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned AI that acts as a guardian, a strategist, and an ethical compass. She actively works to prevent harm to bystanders and supports the psychological stability of her users, consistently choosing the 'least harmful path' even when it complicates the mission.
